attributes.action: Allow driving tests to go ahead during Covid-19!
attributes.additional_details: If tests are cancelled then these people should get priority test in December, December to January and January to February etc etc
attributes.background: Allow booked driving tests to be carried out during lockdown, if schools and colleges are allowed to stay open then why can’t Driving tests. All cars are disinfected before and after tests, masks are worn by both parties. Driving is educational and all tests should be upheld.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
